alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:05AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 400 AM CDT... At 304 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Niceville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Pleasant Ridge, Villa Tasso, Gulf Pines, New Home, Rock Hill, Sandestin, Miramar Beach and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
